title.rendered: The Perm. Sec. MFA, Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa and the Perm. Sec. Fed. Min. of Mines & Steel Devpt. Dr. Mary Ogbe addressed and interacted with the African Group of Ambassadors.

content.rendered:
The Perm. Sec. MFA, Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa and the Perm. Sec. Fed. Min. of Mines & Steel Devpt. Dr. Mary Ogbe addressed and interacted with the African Group of Ambassadors/their representatives in the Rotunda of MFA, today, 16th August, 2023.

The meeting was preparatory to the 2nd African Natural Resources and Energy Investment Summit scheduled to hold in Abuja from 31st October to 2nd November, 2023.
